Package com.blakfx.chat

Class Chat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blakfx.chat.Chat
  • public class Chat
extends Object
    Chat client object, the real core of the application. Upon creation, sets up connections to the chat server and helix. Most of the work is done in the loop, where user input is processed. Dispatches relevant work to Utility, WebsocketClientEndpoint, and HelixModule where necessary.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Chat.EncryptTask
      A Helix encryption task, as a Callable.

      Task to process a global chat message, as a callable.

      Helix private chat action processing task, as a Callable.
      class  Chat.SendGlobalChatTask
      Task to send a global chat message, as a Runnable.
      class  Chat.SendPMChatTask
      Task to send a private chat text message, as a Runnable.
      private class  Chat.SendPMFileTask
      Task to send a private chat file message, as a Runnable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chat

        public Chat​(String aLocalChatUsername,
            WebsocketClientEndpoint aChatEndpoint,
            MessageCache privateCache,
            MessageCache sharedCache,
            HelixModule libHelix)
        Constructs the chat client, if successful. Otherwise, logs error to file, prints it to screen, and terminates.
        Parameters:
        aLocalChatUsername - The username to connect to the chat server
        aChatEndpoint - interface to communicate with chat server
        privateCache - record of private messages between user and individual recipients
        sharedCache - record of shared messages between user and group (of all users)
        libHelix - Instance of loaded Helix Module

    • Method Detail

      • performHelixTask

        public static byte[] performHelixTask​(Callable<byte[]> task,
                                      int msRefreshRate,
                                      int msMaxTime)
                               throws InterruptedException,
                                      ExecutionException
        Attempts to perform and complete a Helix task under a given time
        Parameters:
        task - The Helix task to complete
        msRefreshRate - The time to wait between checking status of the task
        msMaxTime - The max time to complete the task in
        Returns:
        The result, as a byte array, of the Helix action
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - Helix task thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, but was interrupted, either before or during the activity
        ExecutionException - Attempted to retrieve the result of a Helix task that aborted by throwing an exception

      • start

        public final void start()
        Process input until user chooses to quit, or an unrecoverable error arises. User can enter one of the following: commands, private messages, (private) file messages, or normal messages. Private (text/file) messages are secured with Helix via the helixModule, can be viewed only by the recipient/sender, and transported via Protocol Buffers. Global messages are insecure, can be seen by anyone, and are transported via JSON messages.

      • executeCmd_ChatControl

        protected boolean executeCmd_ChatControl​(@NotNull
                                         @NotNull PrintStream anOutStream,
                                         String aChatCommand)
        Execute a "chat control" command, ie one unrelated to actual messaging capabilities.
        Parameters:
        anOutStream - The output stream to print with
        aChatCommand - The command entered by the user
        Returns:
        Whether chat will continue to be active or not

      • executeCommand_Help

        protected void executeCommand_Help​(@NotNull
                                   @NotNull PrintStream anOutStream)
        Execute the help command, printing help for the chat user.
        Parameters:
        anOutStream - The output stream to write the help to

      • shutdown

        protected void shutdown()
        Shutdown actions for the chat application. First, close the WS endpoint. Then, shutdown the thread pool. Finally, shut down helix module.

      • executeCmd_RetrieveChatHistory

        protected void executeCmd_RetrieveChatHistory​(String userInput,
                                              @NotNull
                                              @NotNull PrintStream out)
        Execute the chat history command, which allows to print chat history with a private user or the shared chat. If the contact name is blank/empty, it is interpreted that the user chose to get the shared cache history.
        Parameters:
        userInput - The input entered by the user
        out - The print stream to write to

      • executeCmd_SecureSendFile

        protected void executeCmd_SecureSendFile​(String aLocalChatUsername,
                                         String userInput,
                                         @NotNull
                                         @NotNull PrintStream out)
        Execute the secure send file command, allowing an user to securely send a private file to another via Helix and PB.
        Parameters:
        aLocalChatUsername - The user's local chat name
        userInput - The input the user entered
        out - The print stream to write to

      • executeCmd_SecureSendMessage

        protected void executeCmd_SecureSendMessage​(String aLocalChatUsername,
                                            String aSecretTextMessage,
                                            @NotNull
                                            @NotNull PrintStream out)
        Execute the secure send message command, allowing an user to securely send a private message to another via Helix and PB.
        Parameters:
        aLocalChatUsername - The user's local chat name
        aSecretTextMessage - The text message content to send
        out - The print stream to write to

      • sendGlobalMessage

        private void sendGlobalMessage​(String aSenderName,
                               String aPlaintext)
        Sends some plaintext message to everyone as a global message.
        Parameters:
        aSenderName - the user sending the message
        aPlaintext - the plaintext contents of the message

      • prepareGlobalPayload

        private javax.json.JsonObject prepareGlobalPayload​(String aSender,
                                                   String aPlaintext)
        Prepares a global payload, in JSON format, to send to everyone in sendGlobalMessage. No encryption here, contents sent as-is for everyone.
        Parameters:
        aSender - the user sending the message
        aPlaintext - the plaintexts contents of the message
        Returns:
        the payload to send, as a JsonObject

      • receiveGlobalMessage

        private void receiveGlobalMessage​(String message,
                                  javax.websocket.Session session)
        Receive JSON String message from a given session.
        Parameters:
        message - The JSON string containing the payload received
        session - The Session that sent the message

      • sendPrivateMessage

        private void sendPrivateMessage​(String senderName,
                                String recipientName,
                                String plaintext,
                                String fileName,
                                long aMessageID)
        Sends a private message to a target. Can be file or text, but not both. Contents of either one are secure, encrypted by Helix.
        Parameters:
        senderName - The user sending the private message
        recipientName - The target of the private message
        plaintext - Contains the plaintext content to send as text, or null if file
        fileName - Contains the path to the file to send, or null if text
        aMessageID - A unique counter of message (per direction) for internal tracking

      • preparePrivatePayload

        private DeviceProtocol.Device preparePrivatePayload​(String senderName,
                                                    String recipientName,
                                                    String plaintext,
                                                    String fileName,
                                                    long messageID)
                                             throws IOException,
                                                    InterruptedException,
                                                    ExecutionException,
                                                    HelixModule.HelixException
        Prepares a private payload, in PB format, to send to a specific target. Plaintext content to encrypt is first prepared, whether from a file or text. EncryptTask abstraction does the heavy lifting with respect to encryption. The result is then used as the text content field in the ChatMsg protocol buffer device.
        Parameters:
        senderName - The user sending the private message
        recipientName - The target of the private message
        plaintext - Contains the plaintext content to send as text, or null if file
        fileName - Contains the path to the file to send, or null if text
        messageID - Contains the message ID assigned for this private message
        Returns:
        The Device PB Message to send
        Throws:
        IOException - The file specified does not exist on the local machine of the sender
        InterruptedException - Helix encrypt task thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, but was interrupted, either before or during the activity
        ExecutionException - Attempted to retrieve the result of a Helix encrypt task that aborted by throwing an exception
        HelixModule.HelixException - Something, either fatal/non-fatal, unexpected occurred during the encryption

      • receivePrivateMessage

        private void receivePrivateMessage​(ByteBuffer incomingPacket,
                                   javax.websocket.Session aSession,
                                   long aMessageID)
                            throws com.google.protobuf.InvalidProtocolBufferException
        Receives a private payload, in PB format, from a given session. If text, it's decrypted and printed on screen. If file, it's written out to the user's shared contact directory in both encrypted and decrypted form.
        Parameters:
        incomingPacket - The private payload received
        aSession - The session that sent the private payload
        aMessageID - The message's internal ID for logging
        Throws:
        com.google.protobuf.InvalidProtocolBufferException - The PB received with this message is invalid
